description: The UNDP along with other donor partners seeks to support the Government of Jamaica in meeting its development goals by establishing a facility for responding to strategic short-term development needs with flexibility.

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description:
Increased revenue generation and sustainable debt management  through a series of short consultancies aimed at assisting Jamaica to develop sustainable debt strategies and revenue enhancement methods in order to achieve economic growth and prosperity. Expected Outputs include:
- Communication Strategy for Public Sector Transformation Programme
- Growth Inducement Strategy for Jamaica
- Legislation on Public Debt Management
- Computable General Equilibrium Model 
- National Energy Policy 
- Public Debt Management Legislation 
- Tax Expenditure study
- Expenditure Prioritization study
subproject.title: Strategic Flexible Fund
